mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log(appid,orgid,level, eventype,logmessage, logdetail, userid,recorddate,ipaddress,createdate, createby, identity) VALUES(#{LogOperation.appid},#{LogOperation.orgid},#{LogOperation.level},#{LogOperation.eventype}, #{LogOperation.logmessage}, #{LogOperation.logdetail},#{LogOperation.userid}, #{LogOperation.recorddate},#{LogOperation.ipaddress},NOW(),#{LogOperation.createby}, #{LogOperation.identity} )
